# Session info

```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  error = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  echo = FALSE
)

info <- whirl:::session_info()

```


```{r, results="asis"}
cat('\n## Platform \n')
info$platform
cat("\n")
```


```{r, results="asis"}
cat('\n## Packages\n')
info$packages
cat("\n")
```


```{r, results="asis"}
cat('\n## Environment variables \n')
info$environment
cat("\n")
```


```{r, results="asis"}
cat('\n## Option settings\n')
info$options
cat("\n")
```
